mailer_mails.name: Automatic Reminder
mailer_mails.subject: Due Date Reminder
mailer_mails.body:
Due Date Reminder

Hello ,
This is an email reminder for
What When
#$reminder_text#
This is the last email of this reminder. You will receive #(1) more email on the due date above. #$remaining#
If you remove this reminder, you will not receive any more emails. You will receive #(1) more emails before the due date above. #$remaining#
If you remove this reminder, you will not receive any more emails.
To remove this reminder, click here: Remove
sent by Xaraya Reminder

mailer_mails.name: Automatic Lookup Reminder
mailer_mails.description: An email reminder for a lookup
mailer_mails.subject: Lookup Reminder
mailer_mails.body:
Get In Touch Reminder

Hello ,
This is a suggestion to get in touch with
'mailto:' . $lookup_email . '?subject=Touching base&body=Hi ' . $lookup_first_name . ',' Email: #$lookup_email#
Phone: #$lookup_phone#
To log that you have sent an email to the address above, click here: Log email
To send a composable elegant email that is automatically logged, click here: Compose
sent by Xaraya Reminder

mailer_mails.name: Lookup email
mailer_mails.description: A "touching base" email sent to a lookup contact
mailer_mails.subject: Touching base
mailer_mails.body:
Get In Touch Reminder

#$message#
sent by Xaraya Reminder
